Articles.Content:
My file OUTPUT.LOG in the ksp x64_Data is growing too big and I don't know what's causing it. I have several mods. I looked into the file and found that this messages were repeating themselves all over:

[CurrencyConverter for Fundraising Campaign]: 0 Reputation taken, yields 0 Funds
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[CurrencyConverter for Unpaid Research Program]: 0 Reputation taken, yields 0 Science
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[CurrencyConverter for Fundraising Campaign]: 0 Reputation taken, yields 0 Funds

 

Can these messages mean something is wrong?

Gamedata folder: https://postimg.org/image/5q3m7fcq5/

Last Output.log file zipped: http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_10 (it's not so big here because I deleted the last one which was already too big, and this is just the last played game.)

Those lines look stock to me, and no currencies are being converted, do you have any strategies in effect?

If you have verbose logging enabled you can disable it in the settings screen, and you can disable the output log from the Launcher.
Yes I have strategies currently "working". I will try to disable the verbose logging and come back whe I do with more detals. Thanks.
How do I disable the output log?

51 minutes ago, Agustin said:

How do I disable the output log?

-nolog
It's also in the Launcher.
Yes I got it. Double click the launcher exe and disabled the log from the settbgs within that wi dow. Great, this is beautiful i dont need the log and its consuming fps ultimately.
